replies.msg:
[727實時地圖 727 Real-time map]

本實時地圖顯示遊行路線(急救、物資站等)，並將警方嘅分佈、動向同特別情況例如衝突、路障即時畀大家睇到。動向以箭嘴表示，數目睇框框深淺，越深色越多警察；綠框框內無箭嘴即係靜態警力。停泊警車以黑色車輛圖標顯示。衝突按嚴重性以黃、橙、紅框區分，封路以藍框表示。詳情在內。

This real time map shows the protest route (first-aid, supply stations), and displays the geographic distribution of conflicts/roadblocks and location/momentum of police force. Moving policemen is indicated by arrows, where the shade of the frame indicates number - the deeper it is, the more there are; green frames without arrows represent stationary policemen. Parked police vehicles is indicated by black car icons. Severity of conflicts are indicated by color of frames (yellow, orange, red), and blocked roads are indicated by blue frames. Details in the link.

https://www.google.com/maps/d/viewer?mid=1otTZB6Ga5CLIaBkxFWxKF5RdaymOkG09&ll=22.43665634060596%2C114.02134705000003&z=13
